TopicTitle: Kerbin Aerospace and Space Association - Apogee Mk. 5

Articles.Content:
The Kerbin Aerospace and Space Association (KAASA or KASA depending on how the founder feels on abbreviations that day.) presents our first public craft. As my first post I thought I'd share a craft I love deeply and put a lot of time into. So we present the Apogee Mk. 5, the craft forms the backbone of our station and ship crew-change and refuel missions.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Instructions:

Like all good things its a simple one. Stay around 200m/s till 10,000m, then slowly tilt over and burn, staging as needed.

Action Groups:

1: Toggle Solar Panels

2: Toggle Ladder

9: Jettison Escape Tower

0: Release a used tower and activate Parachutes.

Abort: Release Crew Capsule and activate escape sequence.

Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_4p1PkAC4m3TWwwaGtKTHhaQjQ/view?usp=sharing

Edited July 7, 2015 by HappilyStreet
Looks pretty good. Look for how to embed the imgur albums, or, pretty sure someone will be here shortly to tell you how it goes.

I do hope someone tells me how, my early morning adventures didn't reveal the secret of Imgur embedded albums to me.

Edit: I believe to have figured it out
